p: The vegetable material, C. intybus aerial parts ( Cichorii herba), was collected from Alba County, Lat. 45.643412/Long. 23.640752, Romania, during the flowering stage, in August 2018 from spontaneous flora. A sample of the vegetable material is held in the herbarium of the Pharmacognosy Department (voucher number 114). The plant material was air-dried previous extraction. The results of chemical analysis were expressed per g dry plant material (d.w.).
